answers.answer: Your blood pressure isnt very high so dont worry the baby will be fine. They just want to see how much protein comes out over a period of 24 hours. If its a high amount they will just induce u.. u have nothing to worry about since ur already 39 weeks thr baby is full term! (:

Oh yea indoor to mention my blood pressure has been close to 140s most of my pregnancy one Tim they found a little bit of protein and sent me for blood work... I never did the 24 hour jug... but anyway they found thst I didnt havr it. And I think I had protein in my urine because I was very dehydrated thst morning and my urine was very concentrated.
That's good news to hear. Couldn't sleep at all last night cause I'm just worried. And usually my blood pressure is in the 120's but Idk if that makes a difference. Thanks!

question: I went for my weekly checkup yesterday and my blood pressure was 144/90. Had to pee in a cup and there was a little protein in my urine. So, I had to get blood work done and now I have to collect my pee for 24 hours. I hope everything is OK with my baby :( I'm  it is worried about myself but I just hope she is doing OK in there. Anyone else have signs of preeclampsia when u were 39 weeks pregnant? What happened? Did they induce you or make you wait? Not like this wait for my baby to come is hard enough bit now I have a preeclampsia scare and have to wait for the results of that!  :(
title: 39 weeks pregnant tomorrow
